text: Hollywood Undead is a rap rock band from Los Angeles, California. They became a band in 2005 when members Aron Erlichman (Deuce) and Jorel Decker (J-Dog) released the song "The Kids" on their MySpace account. Their first album Swan Songs was released in 2008 and became a hit claiming Gold in the United States. ==Members== ===Current members=== *Charlie Scene – vocals, lead guitar (2005–present) *Funny Man – vocals (2005–present) *J-Dog – keyboard, synthesizer, vocals, rhythm guitar (2005–present) *Johnny 3 Tears – vocals (2005–present) *Danny - Vocals ===Former members=== *Shady Jeff — vocals, band manager (2005–2007) *Deuce — vocals, producer, lyrics (2005–2010) *Da Kurlzz — vocals, drums, percussions (2005–2017) == Albums == Studio albums: * Swan Songs (2008) * American Tragedy (2011) * Notes from the Underground (2013) * Day of the Dead (2015) * Five (2017) * New Empire vol 1 (2020), Vol 2 (2020) * Hotel Kalifornia (2022) ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Hip hop bands Category:Musical groups from Los Angeles
title: Hollywood Undead
